actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing as a House document of the transcript of hearings of the Select Committee on Committees relating to energy jurisdiction of House committees.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing as a House document of the transcript of hearings of the Select Committee on Committees relating to energy jurisdiction of House committees.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing as a House document of the transcript of hearings of the Select Committee on Committees relating to energy jurisdiction of House committees.
